required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY2886721 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Single- and Multiple-Dose, Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetic, and Pharmacodynamic Study of LY2886721 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this phase I study in healthy participants will be to evaluate the safety and tolerability of LY2886721 single and multiple doses, to evaluate how the body handles the drug, and to evaluate the drug's effect on the body.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Effects
primary_outcome.description: Data presented are the number of participants who experienced treatment-emergent adverse events. A summary of serious adverse events and other non-serious adverse events, regardless of causality is reported in the Adverse Events module.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Plasma Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) of LY2886721
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Plasma Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUCinf) of LY2886721
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Plasma Maximum Observed Concentration at Steady State (Cmax,ss) of LY2886721
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 predose and 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72, 96, and 120 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Plasma Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of LY2886721
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 predose and 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72, 96, and 120 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: AUC over the dosing interval at steady state (AUCtau,ss) is reported for participants who received multiple doses of LY2886721.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid 1-40 Concentration at Day 15
secondary_outcome.description: Least squares (LS) mean percent changes from baseline to Day 15 in CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations for participants in Cohort B are reported. LS means were calculated from an analysis of covariance (ANCOVA) with treatment group and predose CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration as fixed effects. The 95% confidence interval (CI) of the percent change from baseline was computed by back-transforming the mean difference between endpoint and baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid 1-40 Concentration at 24 Hours Post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: LS mean percent changes from baseline to 24 hours post-dose in CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations for participants in Cohort C are reported. LS means were calculated from an ANCOVA with treatment group and predose CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration as fixed effects. The 95% CI of the percent change from baseline was computed by back-transforming the mean difference between endpoint and baseline.

arm_group.description: Single oral dose and/or once daily (QD) oral dosing for 14 consecutive days
QD oral dosing for 14 consecutive days
Single oral dose or single oral dose followed by QD oral dosing for 14 consecutive days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and non-childbearing potential women
- Body mass index (BMI) between 18.0 and 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m^2)
- Are reliable and willing to make yourself available for the duration of the study and are willing to follow study procedures and research unit policies
Exclusion Criteria:
- Taking over-the-counter or prescription medication with the exception of vitamins or minerals
- Smoke more than 10 cigarettes per day
- Drink more than 5 cups of caffeine containing beverages (for example, coffee, tea) per day

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST)

facility.name: For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon - Fri from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Effects
outcome.description: Data presented are the number of participants who experienced treatment-emergent adverse events. A summary of serious adverse events and other non-serious adverse events, regardless of causality is reported in the Adverse Events module.
outcome.population: All enrolled participants. Ten participants, 7 in Cohort B and 3 in Cohort C, received 70 mg LY2886721 as a single dose. Six of the participants in Cohort B went on to receive QD dosing for 14 consecutive days. These 6 participants are included in the 70 mg LY2886721 Single Dose arm and the 70 mg LY2886721 Multiple Dose arm.

group.description: Placebo: QD oral dosing for 14 consecutive days (Cohort A), single oral dose (Period 1) followed by QD oral dosing for 14 consecutive days (Period 2) (Cohort B), or single oral dose (Cohort C)

group.description: 70 mg LY2886721: single oral dose (Cohort B [Period 1] and Cohort C)

These 6 participants are included in the 70 mg LY2886721 Single Dose arm and the 70 mg LY2886721 Multiple Dose arm.

measure.title: Pharmacokinetics: Plasma Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of LY2886721
measure.description: AUC over the dosing interval at steady state (AUCtau,ss) is reported for participants who received multiple doses of LY2886721.

outcome.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid 1-40 Concentration at Day 15
outcome.description: Least squares (LS) mean percent changes from baseline to Day 15 in CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations for participants in Cohort B are reported. LS means were calculated from an analysis of covariance (ANCOVA) with treatment group and predose CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration as fixed effects. The 95% confidence interval (CI) of the percent change from baseline was computed by back-transforming the mean difference between endpoint and baseline.
outcome.population: All randomized participants in Cohort B who received multiple doses of placebo or 70 mg LY2886721 and had evaluable CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations.

group.title: Placebo (Cohort B)
group.description: Placebo: single oral dose (Period 1) followed by QD oral dosing for 14 consecutive days (Period 2)

measure.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid 1-40 Concentration at Day 15
measure.description: Least squares (LS) mean percent changes from baseline to Day 15 in CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations for participants in Cohort B are reported. LS means were calculated from an analysis of covariance (ANCOVA) with treatment group and predose CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration as fixed effects. The 95% confidence interval (CI) of the percent change from baseline was computed by back-transforming the mean difference between endpoint and baseline.
measure.population: All randomized participants in Cohort B who received multiple doses of placebo or 70 mg LY2886721 and had evaluable CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations.

outcome.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid 1-40 Concentration at 24 Hours Post-dose
outcome.description: LS mean percent changes from baseline to 24 hours post-dose in CSF amyloid 1-40 concentrations for participants in Cohort C are reported. LS means were calculated from an ANCOVA with treatment group and predose CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration as fixed effects. The 95% CI of the percent change from baseline was computed by back-transforming the mean difference between endpoint and baseline.
outcome.population: All randomized participants in Cohort C who received placebo or LY2886721 and had measurable CSF amyloid 1-40 concentration data.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
